name: Spring Mora Chest
description: Meow~ This is a new year present from Master Cat Friend! Open this chest of his goodwill to see what's inside!

name: Sprint Goblin Blueprints
description: Speed, passion, and intensity! If you're not sprinting, you're not going fast enough! The light of spring covers the earth... The adventures of the Goblins never end!

name: Sprint Shoes
description: Light boots that allow you to run fast, tied with rope and firmly fastened to your legs.

name: Sprint Shoes [1]
description: Light boots that allow you to run fast, tied with rope and firmly fastened to your legs.

name: Sputum of Bird
description: Bird saliva collected in a long bottle.

name: Staff Of Bordeaux [2]
description: A stick as short as a Staff. It is inlaid with the jewels containing Order Str.

name: Staff Of Bordeaux [3]
description: A stick as short as a Staff. It is inlaid with the jewels containing Order Str.

name: Staff of Destruction [2]
description: The two-handed rod seems to be able to destroy all things. The better the stick, the stronger its explosive power. The user must sacrifice part of his mental strength.

name: Staff of Destruction [3]
description: The two-handed rod seems to be able to destroy all things. The better the stick, the stronger its explosive power. The user must sacrifice part of his mental strength.

name: Staff of Element Fusion [1]
description: The gem at the top of the staff miraculously stores the Str of various elemental magic.
effect: Dex ＋5,For Refining ＋8, ＋10, Damage ＋30%, ＋40% respectively (ranged skills include: [Storm Gust], [Lord of Vermilion], [Sightrasher], [Heaven's Drive], Etc.)

name: Staff of Element Fusion [2]
description: The gem at the top of the staff miraculously stores the Str of various elemental magic.
effect: Dex ＋5,For Refining ＋8, ＋10, Damage ＋30%, ＋40% respectively (ranged skills include: [Storm Gust], [Lord of Vermilion], [Sightrasher], [Heaven's Drive], Etc.)

name: Staff of Mana Storm  [1]
description: A special wand that can only be driven by person who has a great magic can turn the users' magic into power .Mastering it is a required course to become a warlock. "in the face of my magic storm, the enemy will wither like a fallen leaf. Reyen
effect: INT ＋5,Every magic skill attack has a 15% chance to gain ＋10% M.Dmg Bonus for 10s

name: Staff of Mana Storm  [2]
description: A special wand that can only be driven by person who has a great magic can turn the users' magic into power .Mastering it is a required course to become a warlock. "in the face of my magic storm, the enemy will wither like a fallen leaf. Reyen
effect: INT ＋5,Every magic skill attack has a 15% chance to gain ＋10% M.Dmg Bonus for 10s

name: Staff of Wing [1]
description: The orb at the top of the Mace is made from Vanilmirth's favorite food, so using it can excite them.
effect: INT ＋6,For refining increases by ＋1, the skill multiplier of Vanilmirth's [Caprice] ＋35%

name: Staff of Wing [2]
description: The orb at the top of the Mace is made from Vanilmirth's favorite food, so using it can excite them.
effect: INT ＋6,For refining increases by ＋1, the skill multiplier of Vanilmirth's [Caprice] ＋35%

name: Star Back Headwear Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Star God Back Headwear.  A shard left on the battleground of gods. Collect materials and shards and go to Miss Futraca to restore it to its former glory!
